English: Coast of Malden
A week later, Malden
I doubled the patrols around the airport.
Thinking they might re-use their old strategy, George?
Better safe than sorry, James. For all we know they might already be on their way here.
Kremlin assured Raegan they were ordered to stand back and wait for the negotiations in Brussels to finish.
What if history repeats itself? What if they no longer follow official orders?
You mean they might have gone rogue like Livanokh? Then let them come.
The USS Enterprise is only two days away with he rest of the fleet.\nThe moment they attack, our reinforcements shall arrive shortly and push them back into the sea.
There is no way they can take Malden.
They might be after the compound.
How would they know what's inside?
We don't know what Lemontov told them. They could piece the pieces together.
I shall send more men down there. Do me a favor, George, and lead the defense personally. I know I can count on you.
It will be my pleasure, James.
Malden was once the turning point of the war, now it seems it will be its final battleground.
Let us firmly and decisively end this crisis once and for all.
BAZA TO DMITRI, DESTROY AT LEAST THREE ANTI-AIR GUNS BEFORE YOU HEAD NORTH. GOOD LUCK. BAZA OUT.
THE CURSED ISLAND OF MALDEN, COMRADE LEMONTOV! WHAT IT'S LIKE TO BE FINALLY BACK?
YOU SHOULD RATHER FOCUS ON THE MISSION, KAPLINSKY. EVERYONE, FOLLOW ME, WE NEED TO GO INLAND.
ONE DOWN, TWO TO GO.
TWO DOWN, ONE TO GO.
THREE DOWN, MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. NOW WE CAN HEAD NORTH.
ALL FOUR GUNS HAVE BEEN DESTROYED, GOOD WORK. IT'S TIME TO HEAD NORTH.
DMITRI TO BAZA, THE ANTI-AIR GUNS HAV EBEEN DESTROYED AND WE ARE SAFELY IN THE NORTHERN HILLS. YOU CAN PROCEED WITH THE INVASION, OVER.
EXCELLENT WORK, DMITRI. OUR ARMY IS ON ITS WAY. STAY HIDDEN UNTIL OUR FORCES ARRIVE, THEN JOIN THEM IN THE ATTACK. MALDEN SHALL BE OURS, COMRADE! BAZA OUT.
